title: VPN
body:
are you allowed to use VPN? i want play with some one on NA and thay have told me i cold try out virtual private network to fix my 250ping and i was wondering it its an ok thing to do as i wold believe VPN is considered a third party program i could not find the answers with a simple google search so i figured i would ask around 1st before getting myself into trouble.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Yes, using a VPN is allowed however I fail to see how the use of one will decrease your ping to NA, in fact you will more than likely see the opposite result.
